name: dependency-cruiser
description: Validate and visualize dependencies. With your rules. JavaScript, TypeScript, CoffeeScript. ES6, CommonJS, AMD.

scripts.depcruise: node ./bin/dependency-cruise.js src bin test configs types tools --config --ignore-known
scripts.depcruise:all: node ./bin/dependency-cruise.js src bin test configs types tools --config
scripts.depcruise:baseline: node ./bin/depcruise-baseline.js src bin test configs types tools
scripts.depcruise:explain: node ./bin/dependency-cruise.js src bin test configs types tools --output-type err-long --config --progress none
scripts.depcruise:graph:doc:json: node ./bin/dependency-cruise.js bin src test --config --output-type json --output-to tmp_graph_deps.json --progress
scripts.depcruise:graph:doc:fmt-detail: ./bin/depcruise-fmt.js -T dot -f - tmp_graph_deps.json | dot -T svg | tee doc/real-world-samples/dependency-cruiser-without-node_modules.svg | node bin/wrap-stream-in-html.js > docs/dependency-cruiser-dependency-graph.html
scripts.depcruise:graph:doc:fmt-archi: ./bin/depcruise-fmt.js -T archi -f - tmp_graph_deps.json | dot -T svg -Gordering=in -Grankdir=TD | tee doc/real-world-samples/dependency-cruiser-archi-graph.svg | node bin/wrap-stream-in-html.js > docs/dependency-cruiser-archi-graph.html
scripts.depcruise:graph:doc:fmt-dir: ./bin/depcruise-fmt.js -T ddot -f - tmp_graph_deps.json | dot -T svg -Grankdir=TD | tee doc/real-world-samples/dependency-cruiser-dir-graph.svg | node bin/wrap-stream-in-html.js > docs/dependency-cruiser-dir-graph.html
scripts.depcruise:graph:doc:fmt-schema: cd tools/schema && node ../../bin/dependency-cruise.js . --config --output-type dot | dot -T svg | tee ../overview.svg | node ../../bin/wrap-stream-in-html.js > ../../docs/schema-overview.html && cd -
scripts.depcruise:graph:doc:fmt-types: cd types && node ../bin/dependency-cruise.js . --ts-pre-compilation-deps --config --output-type dot | dot -T svg > overview.svg && cd -
scripts.depcruise:graph:dot: node ./bin/dependency-cruise.js bin src --config --output-type dot | dot -T svg > tmp_deps.svg
scripts.depcruise:graph:fdp: node ./bin/dependency-cruise.js bin src --config --output-type dot | fdp -GK=0.1 -Gsplines=true -T svg > tmp_deps.svg
scripts.depcruise:graph:osage: node ./bin/dependency-cruise.js bin src --config --output-type dot | osage -Gpack=32 -GpackMode=array2 -T svg > tmp_deps.svg
scripts.depcruise:graph:view: node ./bin/dependency-cruise.js bin src --prefix vscode://file/$(pwd)/ --config configs/.dependency-cruiser-show-metrics-config.json --output-type dot --progress cli-feedback --highlight "$(watskeburt develop)" | dot -T svg | node ./bin/wrap-stream-in-html.js | browser
scripts.depcruise:graph:view:diff: node ./bin/dependency-cruise.js bin src test --prefix vscode://file/$(pwd)/ --config configs/.dependency-cruiser-unlimited.json --output-type dot --progress cli-feedback --reaches "$(watskeburt develop)" | dot -T svg | node ./bin/wrap-stream-in-html.js | browser
scripts.depcruise:report: node ./bin/dependency-cruise.js src bin test configs types --output-type err-html --config configs/.dependency-cruiser-show-metrics-config.json --output-to dependency-violations.html
scripts.depcruise:report:view: node ./bin/dependency-cruise.js src bin test configs types --output-type err-html --config configs/.dependency-cruiser-show-metrics-config.json --output-to - | browser
scripts.depcruise:focus: node ./bin/dependency-cruise.js src bin test configs types tools --progress --config configs/.dependency-cruiser-show-metrics-config.json --output-type text --focus
scripts.depcruise:reaches: node ./bin/dependency-cruise.js src bin test configs types tools --progress --config configs/.dependency-cruiser-unlimited.json --output-type text --reaches
scripts.lint:eslint: eslint bin/dependency-cruise.js bin src test configs tools/**/*.mjs --cache --cache-location node_modules/.cache/eslint/
scripts.lint:eslint:fix: eslint --fix bin src test configs  tools/**/*.mjs --cache --cache-location node_modules/.cache/eslint/
scripts.test:glob: set -f && test "`bin/dependency-cruise.js test/extract/__mocks__/gather-globbing/packages/**/src/**/*.js | grep "no dependency violations found"`" = "âœ” no dependency violations found (6 modules, 0 dependencies cruised)"
scripts.test:yarn-pnp: npm-run-all test:yarn-pnp:cleanup test:yarn-pnp:pack test:yarn-pnp:copy test:yarn-pnp:install test:yarn-pnp:version test:yarn-pnp:run test:yarn-pnp:test test:yarn-pnp:cleanup
scripts.test:load: hyperfine --warmup 3 --runs 30 "bin/dependency-cruise.js --ignore-known --validate -- src bin test configs types tools"
scripts.test:load:short: hyperfine --warmup 1 --runs 5 "bin/dependency-cruise.js --ignore-known --validate -- src bin test configs types tools"
scripts.update-dependencies: npm-run-all upem:update upem:install build:clean build lint:fix depcruise test:cover

policies.because: version 5 only exports esm - and we use cjs and don't transpile
version 4 only exports esm - and we use cjs and don't transpile
from version 7.2.1 behavior on windows changes - in a potentially breaking fashion. Wait with upgrading until we're majoring or from when there's a vuln in 7.2.0
version 5 only exports esm - and we use cjs and don't transpile
we want to keep interpret ~similar to what webpack-cli uses (which is ^2.2.0)
12.3.5 fails with SyntaxError: Unexpected token o in JSON at position 1
version 4 only exports esm - and we use cjs and don't transpile (this only used in unit tests - but one of'em is a cjs one ...)
we want to keep rechoir ~similar to what webpack-cli uses (which is ^0.7.0, but ^0.8.0 is similar enough and more recent anyway)
version 8 only exports esm - and we use cjs and don't transpile
